name: Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant
about: What it is: A leave-on exfoliant with a blend of mandelic and lactic acids that visibly smooth texture and lines without irritating...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Mandelic Acid: Gently exfoliates and disrupts visible discoloration..- Lactic Acid: Refines skin's surface and helps bind moisture..- Yarrow Extract: Reverses a compromised skin barrier...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This gentle AHA has mandelic acid and a time-released lactic acid to disrupt discoloration, without causing visible post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation (PIH) in deeper skin tones. It also contains yarrow extract and a fermented antioxidant blend of cherry blossom, chocolate vine, and yumberry to support skin's microbiome and barrier...Clinical Results: Based on self-assessment from an independent clinical trial with 30 subjects after 4 weeks:.- 100% had smoother, softer, brighter skin
ingredients: -Mandelic Acid: Gently exfoliates and disrupts visible discoloration..-Lactic Acid: Refines skin's surface and helps bind moisture..-Yarrow Extract: Reverses a compromised skin barrier...Water/Aqua/Eau, 2,3-Butanediol (Humectant/Solvent), Mandelic Acid (Exfoliant), Lactic Acid (Exfoliant/Humectant), Sodium Hydroxide (Ph Adjuster), Myrica Cerifera (Bayberry) Fruit Extract (Plant Extract/Antioxidant), Akebia Quinata (Chocolate Vine) Stem Extract (Plant Extract/Antioxidant), Prunus Lannesiana (Cherry Blossom) Flower Extract (Plant Extract/Antioxidant), Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate (Prebiotic/Probiotic/Postbiotic), Saccharomyces Lysate (Prebiotic/Probiotic/Postbiotic), Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Extract (Plant Extract/Antioxidant), Saccharide Isomerate (Humectant), Arginine (Antioxidant/Humectant), Hydroxyacetophenone (Humectant/Stabilizer), Butylene Glycol (Humectant/Solvent), Sodium Phytate (Chelating Agent), Pentylene Glycol (Humectant), Xanthan Gum (Stabilizer/Texture Enhancer), Citric Acid (Ph Adjuster), Sodium Citrate (Ph Adjuster/Chelating Agent), 1,2-Hexanediol (Preservative/Solvent), Caprylyl Glycol (Humectant), Sodium Benzoate (Preservative).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-At first, use every other day, then up to twice daily..-Apply over face and neck with fingers or a cotton pad. .-Do not rinse..-For daytime, follow with SPF 30+....Pro tips:.-Use AHA and Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant together for multi-level glow. .-Beginner: Start with AHA every two to three days and BHA every two to three days..-Moderate: Alternate AHA and BHA every other day..-Advanced: Use AHA and BHA daily—one in the AM and the other in PM..-For best results, Paula's Choice recommends experimenting with integrating both into your routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for an effective yet gentle exfoliant to improve my skin's texture and tone. Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant has exceeded my expectations.  The packaging is sleek, and the liquid formula is lightweight, absorbing quickly without any sticky residue. I started using it every other night, applying a small amount to a cotton pad and gently swiping it over my clean, dry face. There’s a slight tingling sensation, but it’s not uncomfortable.  Within a few weeks, I noticed my skin was smoother, with a more even tone and fewer breakouts. My skin feels softer and looks more radiant. After a few months of use, I’ve received numerous compliments on my glowing complexion.  Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant is a fantastic addition to any skincare routine. It’s effective in improving texture and tone while being gentle enough for regular use. If you’re looking for a reliable exfoliant, this one is definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product has a lightweight, slightly viscous texture that feels smooth upon application. I found it absorbed quickly without leaving a greasy or sticky residue. Over the weeks of consistent use, I noticed a subtle reduction in the appearance of fine lines. The mandelic and lactic acids gently exfoliate and promote cell turnover, which helped in softening the fine lines, especially around my forehead and mouth. There was a noticeable improvement in my skin's texture and tone. My skin felt smoother, and the rough bumps I previously had were significantly reduced. The redness and slight hyperpigmentation I usually experience seemed less prominent, contributing to a more even complexion overall. One of the most impressive changes was in my skin's luminosity and radiance. The exfoliant effectively removed dead skin cells, revealing a brighter, more radiant complexion. My skin looked more vibrant and had a healthy glow, which was a welcome change from its usual dullness. In summary, Paula's Choice 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Exfoliant made a noticeable difference in my skin's fine lines, texture, tone, and overall radiance. It’s a gentle yet effective product that suits my dry skin and addresses my concerns with redness and hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_title: Gentle and great for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant by Paula’s Choice doesn’t miss, they’re known for their effective products. This liquid exfoliant is wonderful for all skin types and it even worked with my very sensitive skin. This product doesn’t yield fast results as it does take a couple weeks to see results, however that shows how gentle the ingridents are on the skin. It’s difficult to find an exfoliant that is gentle enough and doesn’t cause you to break out. It does all this while also restoring your skin barrier. I started off with using this twice a week and noticed immediately my whiteheads and blackheads diminish. I don’t do more than twice a week simply because my regular routine maintains enough. You only need about three drops to fully cover your face. I’m so confident in the results I took a picture of my skin using my phones back camera to truly show how even my skin looks. I have oily, acne prone and sensitive skin. Normally my face is full of small pimples, fungal acne and enlarged pores. With this added to my consistent routine, it has changed for the better plus! The shine on my skin isn’t from oil! Glass skin energy!

reviews.review_title: Get glowing, beautiful skin with this formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: @manazeffects Paula's Choice 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid protects skins barrier, renews skin below the surface for healthier cell turnover & radiance. Your Definitely on your way to get glowing beautiful skin with this AMAZING formula.  My skin is so obsessed with Paula's Choice liquid exfoliation (Mandelic & lactic) AHA acids that helps to resurface texture and tone, diminish hyperpigmentation from sun damage, and helps to diminish dullness & fine lines.  I've used  6% Mandelic acid 2 % Lactic Acid ( gentle mandelic acid & time-released lactic acid with a soothing blend of fermented antioxidants to resurface) for about 6 months now and I've seen a reduction of sun spots, discoloration and darkspots. My skin looks visible smoother & improved my skin’s barrier.  What I love about this formula is the imidiate and long term results of smooth, more even and glowing skin.   Effective for all skin types including,  normal, dry, combination, and Oily. Love it and highly recommend.   Highlighted Ingredients: - Mandelic Acid: Gently resurfaces uneven texture and tone. - Lactic Acid: Time-released AHA for enhanced exfoliation benefits.   Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free.   HOW TO USE  After cleansing and toning, gently apply AHA using fingers or a cotton pad over entire face and neck. -Avoid direct contact with eyes and lips.  - Do not rinse.  - For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+. For nighttime, follow with the rest of your routine.  -Start slowly: Apply every other day and note skin's response.

reviews.review_title: Transform Your Skin with This Gentle Yet Powerful
reviews.review_text: I've been using this leave-on exfoliant for a few weeks now, and I couldn't be happier with the results! The texture is lightweight and slightly viscous, making it easy to spread evenly over my skin. I apply it over my face and neck with my fingers or a cotton pad, and it absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue. It’s simple to incorporate into my routine, and there’s no need to rinse it off, which is a big plus.  I've noticed a visible reduction in fine lines. They appear softer and less pronounced, which has given my skin a smoother, more youthful look. The exfoliant has significantly improved my skin's texture. It feels much smoother to the touch, and the overall tone of my skin is more even. Dark spots and discoloration have diminished, giving my complexion a more uniform appearance.  One of the most impressive changes has been the increase in my skin’s luminosity. My skin looks brighter and more radiant. The dullness I used to experience has been replaced with a healthy glow that gets noticed! I highly recommend taking pictures in natural lighting to truly capture the amazing transformation. It's incredible to see the before-and-after difference without any need for photoshop.  This product, with its blend of mandelic and lactic acids along with yarrow extract, has delivered on all its promises. It gently exfoliates, smooths texture, softens fine lines, and brightens my skin. The added benefits of supporting the skin’s microbiome and barrier with a fermented antioxidant blend make it a standout in my skincare routine. If you're looking for an effective and gentle exfoliant, this one is definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This exfoliant made my skin super smooth and bright. My skin was in horrible condition for a month and this shook it back 100%. It was super gentle and left a beautiful glow to my skin. I’m absolutely obsessed.

I love this product so much! I have combination skin- i need my oils at bay but not too much strength in my exfoliant to irritate it. This is a great combination of both of those things for my skin personally!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been a fan of Paula’s choice toners, but this one has ingredients that truly work hard to decrease my hyperpigmentation. I love that it has lactic acid! That ingredient is truly a miracle worker!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you use both of the liquid exfoliate together, it’s the perfect duo for achieving smooth skin! Used it only at night and the next morning my skin looked so dewy and smooth. Also, I find that it helped improve my skin when there are days I’m breaking out or when my skin has dry spots. Great to use on days when you feel like your skin needs a good exfoliating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Paula’s choice, and I’m a big fan of their skin perfecting 2% BHA liquid exfoliant. I’ve been wanting to try this skin perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid exfoliant as well and was so happy to have the chance to. I immediately noticed my skin looked brighter and felt smoother a few hours after using. I like that you can leave it on so it’s very easy to use. I can’t wait to see how it helps my dark spots over time and uneven texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing skin is full. I really love the packaging. A really popular brand too. It makes my skin feel very moisturized and very bouncy and glowing. It does not have no sticky feeling at all and it makes my skin look much more brighter and less Doler than it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have just started using this so I can’t comment on long term results yet, but I can say that as a dry, sensitive skin girlie this did not tingle, sting, or itch my skin. And the glow after using is unreal! I can’t wait to see my skin in a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is genuinely the only toner i’ve used that i’ve seen a drastic improvement in my skin. The texture on my face is gone. I don’t have any active pimples, and i don’t feel as this dried out my skin too much or irritated it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The combination of mandelic and lactic acids makes this exfoliant suitable for sensitive skin. Upon application, I notice smoother and softer skin, with a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and uneven texture. It helped fade hyperpigmentation, giving my skin a luminosity and radiance glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face toner. It helps to exfoliate and tone my skin every single evening. I’ve noticed it helped so much with any little bumps or texture. I have on my skin. It is gentle enough to use daily, but very effective!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free but I’m SO happy with it. I’ve wanted to try the other toner from Paula’s Choice but my skins super sensitive. Apparently this is for more sensitive skin and I can say that’s 100% true! I haven’t had any reaction. (Doesn't mean you wont) makes my skin glowy and smooth without irritating it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula’s choice skin perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic acid has helped my skin illuminate and glow from within. While using this product the texture is very smooth and non sticky, I noticed fine lines on my face appear smoother and more bouncy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has done wonders for my skin.  I’ve been using it in the morning before vitamin c and spf and I think it’s the perfect first step in my routine. It has given me such a beautiful glow and created a great base for my other products to sit on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the smaller 1oz size to try before I decide if I wanted to commit to the bigger size- been using it for a few days now and I think it has been gentle enough for my sensitive skin. I will continue to keep using as part of my routine to see if it makes a big different in my pore size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this set from Paulas choice and have been using the AHA and BHA products for about a week now. I have been using the BHA in the morning and AHA in the evening, every other day. I have noticed an overall clarity and decrease in texture in my skin, and my skin just feels healthy and clean. I was also told my skin was glowing this week so I will definitley be continuing to use these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Paula's Choice Exfoliation Kit, and the results are impressive. As shown in the photos, my skin before (right) had visible texture and blemishes. After consistent use, the improvement is clear (left): smoother texture, reduced blemishes, and overall even tone. The kit's gentle yet effective formulation worked wonders, noticeably enhancing my complexion. It’s easy to use and didn't irritate my skin, making it a fantastic addition to my skincare routine. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a reliable exfoliation solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Exfoliation Experience Kit *Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant *Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant >>>I have been using this duo for about two weeks.  I've noticed my skin looks brighter and my acne scars are beginning to fade. Overall, my skin looks healthier. It's smoother, softer, and more glowy. I love that these two products can be used together or separately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula’s choice is top tier skincare . I love mandelic avid because of its gentle exfoliating and removal of hyperpigmentation. It’s perfect for sensitive skin because of gentle and doesn’t irritate the skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this exfoliant. It’s so gentle but also does it’s job. I have sensitive skin and exfoliating can make my skin feel stripped and dry. This makes my skin feel brand new and nourished. I noticed a difference in my skin texture and dark marks after just a couple uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use Paula's Choice Exfoliation Experience Kit every day. I use the AHA in the morning and the BHA in the evening. They make my skin feel smoother. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these two products. I always used the BHA but now I get to use the two products in a routine! My skin is naturally porous and I have bad acne. These products are life savers in helping when I have bad breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to finally get my hands on this toner. It has helped clear my complexion, soften texture in my tone, and it makes my skin feel overall a lot cleaner. I use this on a cotton round am and pm and will be repurchasing this when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid exfoliant has changed my skin for the better! I used to have a complicated, cluttered skincare regime that left my skin irritated and breaking out. My skin is unrecognizable now and literally looks like glass. Do not pass up this product! 🩷

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've seen a noticeable reduction in breakouts and a more even complexion. My skin feels softer, looks brighter, and makeup applies more smoothly. It's become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can't recommend it enough.

reviews.review_title: Good For Very Sensitive Acne- Prone Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for several weeks now, I've come to realize that it's just not potent enough for my skin.  The 2% salicylic acid from Paula's choice also doesn't work for my skin because it just dried me out, but didn't minimize or prevent my hormonal cystic acne. I was hoping that this combination of acids would help, but it's just not doing much after twice daily use for almost a month.    At night I use the Derma E 10% acid peel after double cleansing, follow it up with a 10% glycolic acid peel pad from Bliss and then follow that up with this exfoliating liquid, a hydrating serum, and the Shani Darden peptide moisturizer and it has taken so long to even get my acne to a point of no longer being painful. I had been using benzoyl peroxide for the past 15 years until we found out that it degrades into benzene.   This product might work for someone with mild acne who just wants to make sure they're not clogging pores further after washing their face after working out or something? My face had built a significant tolerance to acids as I can use 10% glycolic acid nightly with no issues of burning or even dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the product for two weeks. It gives me skin barrier issues. I have now a lot of little bumps under my skin. If you have sensitive skin beware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was struggling so bad with inflammation of my skin, tons of texture, waking up with zits every day, rough and bumpy skin… this has completely helped! I use this at night and the BHA one during the day. Loveeee!

I’ve been using 2-3 times a week at nighttime followed by a light serum & moisturizer (stratia rewind serum & FAB ultra repair cream). I have seen great results in my acne and skin texture/tone.

I’ve tried so many (the ordinary, Clinique, Ren, Caudalie, ole henriksen just to name a few) but none worked for me. They either contained alcohol, essential oils or just was too strong). Would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Best liquid exfoliant I have tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid+ 2% Lactic Acid AHA Liquid Exfoliant, and it's become a game-changer in my skincare routine. The combination of mandelic and lactic acids provides a gentle yet effective exfoliation that has noticeably improved the texture and clarity of my skin.  What sets this exfoliant apart is its ability to target multiple skin concerns. The 6% mandelic acid helps with uneven skin tone and discoloration, while the 2% lactic acid works to exfoliate and refine the skin's surface. I've noticed a reduction in hyperpigmentation and a smoother complexion since incorporating it into my routine.  One of the standout features is its lightweight, liquid formula. It's easy to apply and absorbs quickly, making it suitable for both morning and evening use. The absence of a strong fragrance is also a plus for those with sensitive skin.  I appreciate the thoughtful packaging with a dispenser that ensures precise application and minimizes waste. The product has lasted longer than expected, considering a little goes a long way.  While the price point is higher than some drugstore options, the quality and results justify the investment. If you're looking for a versatile AHA exfoliant that addresses various skin concerns without irritation, Paula's Choice Mandelic Acid+ Lactic Acid AHA Liquid Exfoliant is worth considering for your skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: A One and Done Game Changer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the 6% Mandelic Acid+ 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant and I have to say, I am thoroughly impressed with the results. As someone with sensitive skin, I am always hesitant to try new exfoliants, but this product proved to be gentle yet effective.  Firstly, I love that this exfoliant contains both mandelic and lactic acid. Mandelic acid is known for its ability to penetrate deeper into the skin without causing irritation, while lactic acid helps to brighten and hydrate the skin. Together, they make a powerful combination that leaves my skin feeling smooth and looking radiant.  The liquid formula is easy to apply and absorbs quickly into the skin. I have been using it twice a week and have noticed a significant improvement in the texture of my skin. My pores appear smaller and my skin feels much softer. I have also noticed a reduction in the appearance of dark spots and acne scars.  One of the things I appreciate most about this product is that it is free from harsh chemicals and fragrances. It is also cruelty-free, which is a huge plus for me. I have not experienced any irritation or redness while using this exfoliant, which is a rare find for someone with sensitive skin.  I also love that this exfoliant comes in a dark glass bottle with a dropper, making it easy to dispense just the right amount of product. A little goes a long way, so I can see this bottle lasting me a while.  Overall, I highly recommend the 6% Mandelic Acid+ 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective exfoliant. It has become a staple in my skincare routine and I will definitely be repurchasing. Give it a try and see the amazing results for yourself!

It definitely added a luminosity to the skin that my skin needed and my skin got bouncy after usage. I apply it with a cotton pad and it really feels nice on the skin. I am going to be on the lookout for any changes on lines and wrinkles but it has been an enjoyable experience so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This exfoliant is perfect! It helped to make my skin feel so soft and smooth and get rid of the dead dry skin cells/patches that come during the winter months. Left my skin feeling amazing! Love this product and I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. The price point is right for me and it packs a punch. I use it at night and feels like it does a great job of keeping my skin fresh and not looking dull. If I skip a day or two, I definitely can tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great liquid exfoliant! Love how it makes my skin so smooth, soft, and clear. Removes all of the texture from my skin and makes it looks brand new. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a new exfoliant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The SKIN Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid+ 2%  Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant  is a necessary product for resurfacing and renewing your damaged skin.  Improves sun damage, dullness & fine lines Reverses a compromised skin barrier  Renews skin below the surface for healthier cell turnover & radiance  Gentle & effective for all skin types. Are just a few of the things this great product does. It helped balance my skin so I am not over producing oil. It was gentle enough that I had no reactions. I highly recommend this skin resurfacer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am definitely seeing clear result in this product! My skin is much light and more brighten!!! It resurface my skin even when I have sensitive skin texture it works well. It has high 6% Mandelic acid which I like very much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving the BHA exfoliant from Paula’s Choice and so happy they now have one for AHA! I really like it’s a leave on exfoliant so I don’t have to wait to rinse it off. My skin looks very healthy  and smooth after a couple of uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying Paula’s choice. I have normal skin and it’s been dry this winter season. I don’t want to use a harsh exfoliant so this was a good one. I dont have much wrinkles so can’t really tell the function on that but it does make my skin look brighter! Which I really like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula’s Choice Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid is a lightweight, thin, fluid lotion. I have only used it for a few days and notice a small improvement in skin texture on my forehead. I do not notice any smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My current skin concerns are both dryness and acne-prone skin. I've been using this for a few days and have loved my experience using it thus far. I've noticed it makes my skin softer while being a gentle exfoliant. Excited to continue using it for winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary gift in exchange of my honest review. I heard good things about this product and after using it, I noticed my face gotten clearer and better. I can see less of my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This exfoliant has been a huge success for my skin.  It works to smooth, brighten, reduce dark spots and uneven skintone, and works for wrinkles and fine lines as well. It doesn't dry my skin out either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This exfoliating liquid is a must have. I can definitely feel smoother skin; I have full faith in paula choices products. I have been using it alternating with my other active products. Absolutely the must have. Little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by Paul’s choice products so I was excited to try this!! I have sensitive skin so I have to introduce new products slowly into my routine. I used this once every 3 days for the first couple weeks. No irritability and I’m already noticing by skin looking brighter and more even!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This toner is absolutely incredible! The consistency is perfect for all skin types and it absorbs extremely fast!my skin is so much softer and looks way more bright than it did before! I also noticed that the gentle exfoliation makes my wrinkles so much more soft and less apparent. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This toner is yet another holy grail product from Paul’s choice I swear I don’t know how she does it all her things turn into must haves lol but after using this my skin does peel but I use a polish in the am and I’m left with supple fresh looking skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skin perfecting liquid exfoliant is the perfect way to introduce AHAs into your routine. I have sensitive skin but don’t have an issue using this exfoliant as it’s gentle. It helps make my skin more luminous and rids texture. The only thing I’m not crazy about is the natural scent of it, but it’s not intolerable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m sure you have heard of this product before. This acid is amazing! I’ve been using it for a while and I’ve seen great improvement on my blackheads. I use it after cleansing my face. I’m excited to see the long term results! I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great serum! Makes my skin feel so smooth afterwards, and noticeably brightens and tightens my skin. I have sensitive skin and don’t get irritation from this. I use it in the mornings and find my makeup applies so nicely over it. Love the ingredients.

Thank you to Skeepers and to Paula’s choice for letting me try your skin perfecting 6% acid and 2% lactic acid liquid exfoliant! My skin felt softer and smoother with a noticeable change to the texture and lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product at no cost in exchange for my honest review. I like this exfoliator but it is definitely strong. I recommend working your way up to daily use to avoid skin damage. it makes my skin glow so nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a nice exfoliator!! upon using this, i notice that my dark spots have started to fade and that some of my texture’s already leveled out. of course i have to wait a while longer to see if all of my texture gets resolved, but so far it is looking very good. my skin feels more bouncy and brighter, just in time for the cold weather. super satisfied with this product and definitely best for those with mature skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the mandelic acid on my face and by the next morning my complexion is brighter and I noticed a difference in my skin texture right away! I highly recommend this because it’s gentle yet effective as a liquid exfoliant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skin perfecting liquid exfoliant is super amazing for my skin. It doesn’t irritate it at all. It makes my skin feel smooth and soft after each and every use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my biggest concerns right now is aging skin. I was so excited to try this product and it did not disappoint! I noticed a reduction in my fine lines right away. My skin also looks more smooth and glowy! I can’t wait to keep using this product. Another win from Paula’s Choice!

This is a very nice and effective leave on treatment for clearer and less textured skin. It feels slightly tingly on my skin, but has really helped with reducing texture and lessened some mild scarring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a huge fan of Paula’s choice exfoliators (and the brand in general) and this new Mandelic and Lactic acid exfoliant is an amazing addition to their line. This is incredibly gentle yet effective. I am excited to continue using to see the full results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like bha exfoliating toner I recommend giving this a try Paula’s choice will always be my choice for acne prone skin safe exfoliation! This is gentle yet affective on my acne prone sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid exfoliant works wonders. It leaves my skin feeling super smooth and it’s easy to use. The bottle is a good size and can be easily applied to a cotton pad. Overall I would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new serum is great! My skin is so much smoother and has so much less texture! I’ve even noticed my dark spots getting lighter with use! And my skin seems to be breaking out less! It’s also gentle enough that I haven’t had any irritation from it! It applies so nicely and melts into the skin so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: During the winter months, my skin becomes extremely dry and has a lot more texture but after using Paula’s Choice liquid exfoliant, my skin has so much luminosity and the texture is a lot less and gives such a glow to my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very worried this would burn as I had never tried this brand before but it was actually super gentle. The texture is very watery so it absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave a heavy or sticky feeling. I used it at night before I went to bed and didn’t wake up with any active breakouts! Of course it’ll take a long time to see results for discoloration but the fact that it’s seeming to control my acne is enough for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid exfoliant feels gentle on my skin.  I didn't experience any sensitivity for my combination oily skin and I find that my skin feels smooth and radiant after using this exfoliant.  Overall I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This ingredient is new and wonderful. Your face feels shiny and radiant. It lightens spots and helps reduce pores. You feel your face clean and moisturized. I highly recommend it. Thank you paula’s choice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have only tried a few of Paula’s Choice products but they have all been wonderful! This product is no exception! It’s very gentle yet extremely effective! I love AHAs especially lactic acid and the price is on point as well. My skin looks amazing and very youthful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this product from Paula’s Choice and have been loving it so much lately. It’s easy to use and leaves my skin flawless. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. Great discovery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a great gentle exfoliator for sensitive skin!! It has helped with my skin renewal without causing any irritation. It’s a water based exfoliator and absorbs very quickly into the skin. My skin looks more even and my hyperpigmentation are slowly fading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay i am literally obsessed with anything that Paula’s choice comes out with so i was so excited to receive this product from Paula’s choice in exchange for my honest review! I’m in love! It’s so hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything I’ve tried from this line. This is great for perfecting my skin and getting rid of dead skin. Highly recommend and then to follow up with nice serum and moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of the Paula’s Choice BHA liquid exfoliant for years, but I think I like this one even more! It feels so gentle on the skin,  and contains mandelic acid, which is know to help with hyperpigmentation, which I have a lot of. After using the first time, I noticed my skin was smoother and brighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this face wash 6% Mandelic Acid+ 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant complementary from Paula’s choice  sample for my honest opinion. What a game changer I love the way my face felt after using it. The smell was refreshing and very clean not too much. I felt my face felt natural and fresh when I finished using it!I also loved the smell it had a clean almost citrus smell to it. I really felt it did an amazing job at making my face look much less oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. What can I say this product didn’t disappoint.  After using this product the texture of face felt smoother and softer. My skin also felt brighter. I’m excited to make this another part of my nightly routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this new liquid exfoliant. Very affordable and easy to use product. It visibly smoothes my skin and make the skin tone more even. I have sensitive skin and it didn’t cause me any irritation. Skin is very soft after the use.

reviews.review_title: I could see a difference after the first night!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving the new liquid exfoliant. Its lightweight and absorbs quickly and easily into the skin. It has a very watery consistency. Similar to the OG BHA liquid exfoliant. I started using this a few times a week. I apply this on nights I’m not using other exfoliants or actives. It's extremely effective yet gentle on the skin. I could see a difference after the first night. It helps to improve skin texture and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Leaving me with a smoother, brighter complexion.
